result.eng: Are you happy in your life?
result.ga: An bhfuil tú sásta i do shaol
result.orig: An bhfuil tú sásta i do shaol
result.html: An bhfuil tú sásta i do shaolAre you happy in your life?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú sásta i do ẛaolAre you happy in your life?

result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.eng: I was happy until now.
result.ga: Bhí mé sásta go dtí seo
result.orig: Bhí mé sásta go dtí seo
result.html: Bhí mé sásta go dtí seoI was happy until now.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sásta go dtí seoI was happy until now.

result.eng: The smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ga: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.orig: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn sí
result.html: Dá laghad an t-ualach atá uirthi is sásta a bhíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.
result.ponchtml: Dá laġad an t-ualaċ atá uirṫi is sásta a ḃíonn síThe smaller the load that's on her, the happier she is.

result.eng: No matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ga: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.orig: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sásta
result.html: Dá mhéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.
result.ponchtml: Dá ṁéad airgead atá acu níl siad sástaNo matter how much money they have, they are not happy.

result.eng: If it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ga: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.orig: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfad
result.html: Más amhlaidh go bhfuil na páirtithe sásta cumhacht a roinnt beidh comhrialtas ann sul i bhfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.
result.ponchtml: Más aṁlaiḋ go ḃfuil na páirtiṫe sásta cuṁaċt a roinnt beiḋ coṁrialtas ann sul i ḃfadIf it is the case that the parties are ready to share power, there will be a coalition government before long.

result.eng: The audience was not happy with the programme.
result.ga: Ní raibh an lucht féachana sásta leis an chlár
result.orig: Ní raibh an lucht féachana sásta leis an chlár
result.html: Ní raibh an lucht féachana sásta leis an chlárThe audience was not happy with the programme.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ an luċt féaċana sásta leis an ċlárThe audience was not happy with the programme.

result.eng: He wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ga: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.orig: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadh
result.html: Ní raibh sé sásta labhairt liom a thuilleadhHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ sé sásta laḃairt liom a ṫuilleaḋHe wasn't willing to talk to me any more.

result.eng: I am not willing to pay for it.
result.ga: Níl mé sásta íoc as
result.orig: Níl mé sásta íoc as
result.html: Níl mé sásta íoc asI am not willing to pay for it.
result.ponchtml: Níl mé sásta íoc asI am not willing to pay for it.

result.eng: The sun is shining and I am happy.
result.ga: Tá an ghrian ag taitneamh agus tá mise sásta
result.orig: Tá an ghrian ag taitneamh agus tá mise sásta
result.html: Tá an ghrian ag taitneamh agus tá mise sástaThe sun is shining and I am happy.
result.ponchtml: Tá an ġrian ag taitneaṁ agus tá mise sástaThe sun is shining and I am happy.

result.eng: I am very happy with the results.
result.ga: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torthaí
result.orig: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torthaí
result.html: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torthaíI am very happy with the results.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé an-sásta leis na torṫaíI am very happy with the results.

result.eng: I am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ga: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.orig: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agat
result.html: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má bhíonn fadhbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sásta cuidiú leat má ḃíonn faḋbanna agatI am happy to help you whenever you have problems.

result.eng: I'm happy enough.
result.ga: Tá mé sásta go leor
result.orig: Tá mé sásta go leor
result.html: Tá mé sásta go leorI'm happy enough.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé sásta go leorI'm happy enough.

result.eng: We are satisfied/happy.
result.ga: Tá muide sásta
result.orig: Tá muide sásta
result.html: Tá muide sástaWe are satisfied/happy.
result.ponchtml: Tá muide sástaWe are satisfied/happy.

result.eng: I am satisfied/happy.
result.ga: Tá mé féin sásta
result.orig: Tá mé féin sásta
result.html: Tá mé féin sástaI am satisfied/happy.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé féin sástaI am satisfied/happy.

result.eng: He will be completely satisfied with it.
result.ga: Beidh sé lán-sásta leis
result.orig: Beidh sé lán-sásta leis
result.html: Beidh sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé lán-sásta leisHe will be completely satisfied with it.

result.eng: You will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ga: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.orig: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidh
result.html: Beidh tú sásta a bheith sa mbaile aríst nach mbeidhYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ tú sásta a ḃeiṫ sa mbaile aríst naċ mbeiḋYou will be happy to be at home again, won't you?

result.eng: It was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ga: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.orig: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féin
result.html: Bhí sé fíordheas cúpla seachtain a chaitheamh anseo ach beidh mé sásta a bheith ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé fíorḋeas cúpla seaċtain a ċaiṫeaṁ anseo aċ beiḋ mé sásta a ḃeiṫ ar ais sa mbaile mar sin féinIt was really nice to spend a few weeks here, but I will be happy to be back home all the same.

result.eng: There are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.
result.ga: Tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - Tá Tá mé an-sásta ansin
result.orig: Tá áiseanna maithe ann mar sin - Tá Tá mé an-sásta ansin

result.ponchtml: Tá áiseanna maiṫe ann mar sin - Tá Tá mé an-sásta ansinThere are good facilities there, then. - Yes. I'm very happy there.

result.eng: We've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
result.ga: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leis

result.html: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teach anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leisWe've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.
result.ponchtml: Táimid inár gcónaí sa teaċ anois le sé bliana agus táimid an-sásta leisWe've been living in the house now for six years and we're very happy with it.

result.eng: I was happy, in a way.
result.ga: Bhí mé sásta ar shlí
result.orig: Bhí mé sásta ar shlí
result.html: Bhí mé sásta ar shlíI was happy, in a way.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé sásta ar ẛlíI was happy, in a way.

result.eng: All you need to care about is that the old folks are happy.
result.ga: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
result.orig: Is cuma duitse ach an tseanlánúin a bheith sásta
